chat.content:
Help me to prove a theorem in Coq, based on provided proof states including hypotheses and goals. Give a complete proof in only one single code block without explanations, extra definitions. Give a complete proof in one response, only give the proof body, without repeating the definition and "Proof.". Avoid existing names when using intros. Write the commands separately, without ";" and "[cmd|cmd]". Use bullets for structure, NEVER use "{" and "}". When -, + and * are used out, proceed to double versions like --, ++, etc. For example, given proof state:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m
============================
m + S n = S n + m
The hypotheses n, m: nat and IHn: m + n = n + m are given first, then the goal, m + S n = S n + m, separated by =. Expect a response like: 
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.``` 
You do not intros any terms because all terms have already been introduced.

When I give:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m
============================
n, m: nat
your answer should be like:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```
Definitions and lemmas related to the proof will be provided, use them accordingly.

Hypotheses:
orig_base_params: BaseParams
one_node_params: OneNodeParams orig_base_params
raft_params: RaftParams orig_base_params
rri: raft_refinement_interface
cti: cronies_term_interface
tsi: term_sanity_interface
vci: votes_correct_interface
cci: cronies_correct_interface

Goal:

Record RaftParams (orig_base_params : BaseParams) : Type := Build_RaftParams { N : nat; input_eq_dec : forall x y : input, {x = y} + {x <> y}; output_eq_dec : forall x y : output, {x = y} + {x <> y}; clientId : Type; clientId_eq_dec : forall x y : clientId, {x = y} + {x <> y} } Arguments Build_RaftParams _ _%nat_scope (_ _)%function_scope [clientId]%type_scope _%function_scope
data = fun BaseParams0 : BaseParams => let (data, _, _) := BaseParams0 in data : BaseParams -> Type Arguments data {BaseParams}
handleRequestVote = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (_ : name) (state : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (t : nat) (candidateId : fin N) (lastLogIndex lastLogTerm : nat) => if t <? currentTerm state then (state, RequestVoteReply (currentTerm state) false) else let state0 := advanceCurrentTerm state t in if (if leaderId state0 then false else true) && moreUpToDate lastLogTerm lastLogIndex (maxTerm (log state0)) (maxIndex (log
Module RaftState := Struct Record raft_data (term name entry logIndex serverType stateMachineData clientId output : Type) : Type := mkRaft_data { currentTerm : term; votedFor : option name; leaderId : option name; log : list entry; commitIndex : logIndex; lastApplied : logIndex; stateMachine : stateMachineData; nextIndex : list (name * logIndex); matchIndex : list (name * logIndex); shouldSend : bool; votesReceived : list name; type : serverType; clientCache : list (clientId * (nat * output)); electoralVictories : list (term * list name * list entry)
output = fun BaseParams0 : BaseParams => let (_, _, output) := BaseParams0 in output : BaseParams -> Type Arguments output {BaseParams}
name = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fin N : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, RaftParams orig_base_params -> Type Arguments name {orig_base_params raft_params}
*** [ Core.ByteListReader.t : Type -> Type ] Arguments Core.ByteListReader.t _%type_scope
fin = fix fin (n : nat) : Type := match n with | 0 => False | S n' => option (fin n') end : nat -> Type Arguments fin _%nat_scope
Record OneNodeParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_OneNodeParams { init : data; handler : input -> data -> output * data } Arguments Build_OneNodeParams _ _ _%function_scope
N = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (RaftParams0 : RaftParams orig_base_params) => let (N, _, _, clientId, _) := RaftParams0 in N : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, RaftParams orig_base_params -> nat Arguments N {orig_base_params RaftParams}
Notation is_request_vote_reply m := (exists t r, m = RequestVoteReply t r)
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
Inductive msg (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Type := RequestVote : term -> name -> logIndex -> term -> msg | RequestVoteReply : term -> bool -> msg | AppendEntries : term -> name -> logIndex -> term -> list entry -> logIndex -> msg | AppendEntriesReply : term -> list entry -> bool -> msg Arguments msg {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments RequestVote {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments RequestVoteReply {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _%bool_scope Arguments AppendEntries {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _ _ _ _%list_scope Arguments Append
Inductive serverType : Set := Follower : serverType | Candidate : serverType | Leader : serverType
clientId = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (RaftParams0 : RaftParams orig_base_params) => let (_, _, _, clientId, _) := RaftParams0 in clientId : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, RaftParams orig_base_params -> Type Arguments clientId {orig_base_params RaftParams}
raft_data = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, RaftParams orig_base_params -> Type Arguments raft_data {orig_base_params raft_params}
Record entry (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Type := mkEntry { eAt : name; eClient : clientId; eId : nat; eIndex : logIndex; eTerm : term; eInput : input } Arguments entry {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments mkEntry {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _ _%nat_scope

handleRequestVote_type : forall (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (h : name) (h' : fin N) (t lli llt : nat) (st' : raft_data) (m : msg), handleRequestVote h st t h' lli llt = (st', m) -> type st' = type st /\ currentTerm st' = currentTerm st \/ type st' = Follower

```coq
intros d h h' t lli llt d' m H.
unfold is_request_vote_reply.
unfold handleRequestVote in H.
destruct (t <? currentTerm d) eqn:Hlt.
- injection H as <- <-. exists (currentTerm d), false. reflexivity.
- destruct (andb (negb (isSome (leaderId (advanceCurrentTerm d t)))) (moreUpToDate llt lli (maxTerm (log (advanceCurrentTerm d t))) (maxIndex (log (advanceCurrentTerm d t))))) eqn:Handb.
  + injection H as <- <-. exists t, true. reflexivity.
  + injection H as <- <-. exists t, false. reflexivity.
Qed.
```

original: intros d h h' t lli llt d' m H. unfold is_request_vote_reply. unfold handleRequestVote in H. destruct (t <? currentTerm d) eqn:Hlt. - injection H as <- <-. exists (currentTerm d), false. reflexivity. - destruct (andb (negb (isSome (leaderId (advanceCurrentTerm d t)))) (moreUpToDate llt lli (maxTerm (log (advanceCurrentTerm d t))) (maxIndex (log (advanceCurrentTerm d t))))) eqn:Handb. + injection H as <- <-. exists t, true. reflexivity. + injection H as <- <-. exists t, false. reflexivity.
